event.title: New Year's Day Bowl
event.detail: Holidays got you feeling a little heavy? Well kick off your exercise program with us at the 3rd annual New Year's Day Bowl. Come out Wednesday, Jan 1, at 9AM for flag football and fellowship. If you missed out on the Turkey Bowl, here's your chance to stretch those muscles and burn your best friend for a touchdown. Pick up a flyer at the information area for details and a map.

event.title: Conference Bible Study
event.detail: Hyde Park Baptist Church in Austin is sponsoring "The Left Behind Conference" featuring Tim LaHaye on Saturday, Jan 11. You may pick up a brochure as well as purchase a conference ticket for $15 at our Events Center in the lobby. A meal ticket is also available for $5.

event.title: Mexico Mission Trip
event.detail: On Jan 3-5 come share the love of Jesus with His children South of the border in Ejido Sandoval, Mexico. Sign up at the Events Center in the lobby.

event.title: Live Music - Eph-pha-tha
event.detail: Come to Coffee Creator for some live music, great coffee, and fellowship.

event.detail: Come to Coffee Creator for some live music, great coffee, and fellowship.

event.detail: Come to Coffee Creator for some live music, great coffee, and fellowship.

event.detail: Come to Coffee Creator for some live music, great coffee, and fellowship.

event.title: Live Music - Evans & Curran
event.detail: Come to Coffee Creator for some live music, great coffee, and fellowship.

event.title: 2003 Mid-South Worship Conference
event.detail: We are bringing a worship conference to you!! Calvary Austin is hosting the Mid-South Music & Worship Conference Feb 20-22. Holland Davis of Calvary Chapel Costa Mesa will be our guest worship leader & speaker. Early registration is $45 through today, Sunday, Feb 9. Come by the Events Center. Registration is $55 at the Events Center.Learn more...

event.title: Karaoke Night
event.detail: Come to Coffee Creator for some karaoke, great coffee, and fellowship.

event.title: One Day Conference on Israel
event.detail: Join us Saturday, Feb 1, for a day with Roni Simon. He is a native of Israel, an IDF reservist, and has served as our tour guide on trips to Israel. Roni will cover 4 topics: History of Israel, Jesus' Israel, the State of Israel, and the Israel/Palestinian conflict. The conference will run from 9AM to 3PM. The cost is $5 and you may sign up at the Events Center.

event.title: Mexico Mission Trip
event.detail: Looking for an opportunity to serve the LORD while having sweet fellowship with your family of God? The weekend trip to Pan De Vida Mexico is just around the corner. Check the Events Center for details.

event.title: Extended Worship
event.detail: Let’s come together this Wednesday, Feb 12, for a time of extended worship of the Lord during our regular midweek service at 7PM.

event.title: Vision Night
event.detail: Be sure not to miss Wednesday evening, Feb 19, as Pastor Allen shares the things that God has placed on the hearts of the leadership here at Calvary. He’ll be sharing from the Word as well as providing updates on the progress of our search for a new facility.

event.title: New Believer's Class
event.detail: A 12-week New Believers’ class starts Feb 17 at 7PM. Sign up at the Events Center. This class covers basic Bible fundamentals for those interested in getting a firmer foundation on what they believe.

event.title: Crosswind
event.detail: Come to Coffee Creator for some music, great coffee, and fellowship.

event.title: Eph-pha-tha
event.detail: Come to Coffee Creator for some music, great coffee, and fellowship.

event.title: Calvary 2003 Women's Retreat
event.detail: There is still room available to sign up for the Mar 14-16 women’s retreat. Join us at beautiful Camp Balcones Springs for a refreshing time of teaching, reflection and fellowship. If you made a deposit, the remaining balances are due today at the Events Center.

event.title: Worship Team/Community Auditions
event.detail: Auditions will be held this Saturday, Mar 22. The necessary audition packets are available at the Events Center in the lobby. Please call the office if you have further questions.

event.title: Heart-to-Heart
event.detail: Sign ups continue for Heart-to-Heart, the women's ministry that pairs up women once a year for the purpose of developing meaningful Christ-centered relationships. Pick up a pink Heart-to-Heart form, fill it out and turn it in at the Events Center by next Sunday, Mar 23.

event.title: Communion Service
event.detail: Join us this Wednesday, Mar 26, for the celebration of communion during our regular service at 7PM.

event.title: Crosswind
event.detail: Come to Coffee Creator for some music, great coffee, and fellowship. Learn more about Crosswind at their web site!

event.title: Kevin Gathright
event.detail: Come to Coffee Creator for some music, great coffee, and fellowship.

event.title: Work Day
event.detail: Saturday, Mar 22, will be a work day at the church from 8AM to 3PM. No tools needed, just bodies. There will be indoor and outdoor work to be done. Come hang out and enjoy the fellowship.

event.title: Marriage Conference
event.detail: A 3-day marriage conference, May 2-4, by FamilyLife will be held at the Omni Austin Hotel Southpark. The deadline for group registration at the Events Center (significant savings) is next Sunday, Apr 13.

event.title: Evening of Worship
event.detail: Please join us next Saturday, April 5, at 7PM. Come and participate in worship, adoration and lingering in the presence of God. Childcare will be provided for Nursery through Kindergarten.

event.title: Family Camp
event.detail: Blanco State Park, May 30 - Jun 1, limited space. Call John Adams (834.0173) for details. Sign up and pay your deposit at the Events Center by next Sunday, Apr 13, for a Calvary camping adventure.

event.title: Mexico Mission Trip
event.detail: Consider coming on a short mission trip, Friday through Sunday, to Pan De Vida, Mexico to take supplies and minister to a women’s shelter and orphanage.

event.title: Front Line Corpus Mission Trip
event.detail: More details coming soon
